trans-unit.source: Represents selectable child items of container controls that support <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref>.
See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.
Adds the current element to the collection of selected items.

An attempt is made to add a selection to a single-selection container where <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.CanSelectMultipleProperty"></xref> = <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and another element is already selected.
Gets the cached property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref>.
Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
To get the current value of a property, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Current%2A>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>.
The cached property values.
The requested property is not in the cache.
Gets the current property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref>.
This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation>.
The current property values.
Identifies the event raised when an item is added to a collection of selected items.

If the result of an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent> will be raised instead.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
To be added.
Identifies the event raised when an item is removed from a collection of selected items.

If the result of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.ElementSelectedEvent> will be raised instead.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
To be added.

Identifies the event that is raised when a call to any of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Select*>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection*>, or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection*> results in a single item being selected.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.IsSelected*> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref> control pattern.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.

The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
To be added.
Removes the current element from the collection of selected items.

An attempt is made to remove a selection from a selection container where one item is selected and <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.IsSelectionRequiredProperty"></xref> = <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Deselects any selected items and then selects the current element.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.SelectionContainer*> property.
This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers>.
To be added.
